channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Ex-aide to California governor indicted for alleged theft of campaign funds from ex-health secretary
item.description: A former top aide to California Gov. Gavin Newsom has been indicted on federal charges alleging her involvement in a scheme to steal campaign money from former federal Health Secretary Xavier Becerra.

item.title: Chicagoans buy out street vendors amid a federal immigration crackdown
Appeals court weighs arguments on law cutting Medicaid funds to Planned Parenthood
